name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程將探討蛋白質的結構與功能,蛋白質的純化,酵素動力學, 核酸及醣類的結構, 並介紹基因工程技術。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Water
3.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 1)
4.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 2)
5.　　Exam 1
6.　　The Three-Dimensional Structure of Proteins (part 1)
7.　　The Three-Dimensional Structure of Proteins (part 2)
8.　　Protein Function (part 1)
9.　　Protein Function (part 2)
10.　　Enzymes (part 1)
11.　　Enzymes (part 2)
12.　　Exam 2
13.　　Carbohydrates
14.　　Nucleotides and Nucleic Acids
15.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 1)
16.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 2)
17.　　Exam 3
materials: Lehninger Principles of Biochemistry by Nelson and Cox, 5th Ed, W. H. Freeman and Company (歐亞書局)
